message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm and believe in its value. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.

I understand that you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $170. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Let me know if that's something you'd be comfortable with.
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $165. I think that's a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let's meet in the middle at $165.
I understand your position, but I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit stuck. I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I'll meet you at $162.50. That's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product.
I'm not willing to go back to $160. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $163. That's the absolute lowest I can go. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
Considering our past negotiations, I would like to propose a final price of $161 for the product.
